Your tablet will learn how you use apps over time.‎‏‎‎‏‏‎\n‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎‎‏‎‎‏‏‎\n‎‏‎‎‏‏‏‎Notifications may be delayed for these apps.‎‏‎‎‏‎"
